aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Segment Depreciation and Amortization Expenses
North America segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $11,565 million for the year ended December 31, 2022.
North America segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $13,678 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
North America segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $14,285 million for the year ended December 31, 2024.
International segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $3,483 million for the year ended December 31, 2022.
International segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $4,016 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
International segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $4,462 million for the year ended December 31, 2024.
AWS segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $9,876 million for the year ended December 31, 2022.
AWS segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $12,531 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
AWS segment had depreciation and amortization expense of $13,320 million for the year ended December 31, 2024.
Amazon's consolidated depreciation and amortization expense was $24,924 million for the year ended December 31, 2022.
Amazon's consolidated depreciation and amortization expense was $30,225 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
Amazon's consolidated depreciation and amortization expense was $32,067 million for the year ended December 31, 2024.
